name: Space Shooter (itch) (clayclay360)
description: Welcome to Space Shooter! Both you and the enemy start off with one ship, and your goal is to defeat and destroy all enemy ships. This strategy game allows players to build  and control their ships at their own will. You can attack the enemy with artillery and repair any damaged ship. Before your turn you have to roll a dice to see how many points they get. You will have to use your points to command your ship(s). Now that all is said and done, best of luck and have fun!
